arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" ISSUE_INST_CD, " +" OD_NO, " +" ITEM_CD, " +" PLANT_CD, " +" PUCH_ODR_CD, " +" COMPANY_CD, " +" VEND_CD, " +" WORK_ODR_CD, " +" WORK_IN_PROC_CD, " +" WH_CD, " +" ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG, " +" ISSUE_TYP, " +" CONS_TYP, " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ISSUE_INST_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(DECODE(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", '1', 0,(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_QTY\\" - T_ISSUE_INST.\\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\")), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"SHIP_REMAIN_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"where " +" ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"
"select " +" 1 " +"from " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"where " +" ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"
"select " +" 1 " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.JOB_ODR_CD = ?"
"select " +" WH_CD, " +" PLANT_CD, " +" MRP_FLG, " +" VEND_CD " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" WH_CD = ?"
"select " +" M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG, " +" MRP_ODR_TYP " +"from " +" T_ISSUE_INST, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD"
"select " +" 1 " +"from " +" T_LOT_CTRL, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"where " +" T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO = ? " +" and T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD = T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"
"select " +" 1 " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.ITEM_CD = T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"

"select " +" 1 " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.ITEM_CD = T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"

"select " +" BEST_BEFORE_DATE " +"from " +" T_LOT_CTRL, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"where " +" T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO = ? " +" and T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD = ISSUE_INST_CD.ITEM_CD " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" PROC_EXEC_DATE " +"FROM " +" SYS_ACTUAL_COST_CTRL_AC " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ?"

"SELECT " +" NVL(CASE " +" WHEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + M_ITEM.\\"BEST_BEFORE_DATE_LT\\" > T_LOT_CTRL.\\"BEST_BEFORE_DATE\\" THEN '1' " +" ELSE '0' " +" END, 0) BBD_c_FLG " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_CTRL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" VALUE " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" NAME = ?"
"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(INSTALL_FLG) AS INSTALL_FLG " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" OPTION_ID = 'C*'"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(THIS_MONTH, 'YYYY/MM'), 'YYYY/MM') AS THIS_MONTH " +"FROM " +" SYS_DEBT_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ( " +" SELECT " +" COMPANY_CD " +" FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" WHERE " +" CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" )"

"select " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" as \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ISSUE_INST_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(DECODE(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", '1', 0,(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_QTY\\" - T_ISSUE_INST.\\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\")), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"SHIP_REMAIN_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"SCDL_ISSUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"SCDL_ISSUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_CMPLT_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"ISSUE_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\" as \\"ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"CONS_TYP\\" as \\"CONS_TYP\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\") as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_WS.\\"WS_NAME\\" as \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NAME\\" as \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD.proc\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD.item\\" " +"from " +" T_ISSUE_INST, " +" T_OD, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" M_WS, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_ISSUE_INST.OD_NO = T_OD.OD_NO(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.WS_CD = M_WS.WS_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.COMPANY_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.WORK_IN_PROC_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_IN_PROC_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD(+) " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WS_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"VEND_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\" = ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ISSUE_INST.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\" = ? " +"order by " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\""

"insert into " +" T_RCV_ISSUE(\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP\\", \\"STOCK_UPD_TYP\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"OD_NO\\", \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\", \\"LOT_NO\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"UNIT_COST\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ONEROUS_FLG\\") as \\"ONEROUS_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +"order by " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" desc"

"insert into " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS(\\"ONEROUS_CONS_NO\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ISSUE_DATE\\", \\"ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"UNIT_COST\\", \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", \\"RETURNED_WH_CD\\", \\"RETURNED_CAUSE_CD\\", \\"RETURNED_GNR_TYP\\", \\"AP_PROC_TYP\\", \\"LOT_NO\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, null, 0, 0, ?)"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST(\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", \\"LOT_NO\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"ISSUE_DATE\\", \\"SPENT_QTY\\") " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), 0)"

"SELECT " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.LOT_NO AS LOT_NO, " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.PUCH_ODR_CD AS PUCH_ODR_CD, " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.WORK_ODR_CD AS WORK_ODR_CD, " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_QTY, 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS ISSUE_QTY, " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS ISSUE_DATE, " +" TO_CHAR((T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_QTY - T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.SPENT_QTY), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS SPENT_QTY, " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT AS STOCK_UNIT " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST, " +" T_ISSUE_INST, " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ? " +" AND T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +"ORDER BY " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.LOT_NO"

"UPDATE " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST " +"SET " +" ISSUE_QTY = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" ISSUE_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ? " +" AND T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.LOT_NO = ?"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_QTY\\") AS \\"ISSUE_QTY\\" " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.LOT_NO = ? " +"FOR UPDATE NOWAIT"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') as \\"SUM_STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK, " +" M_WH " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and M_WH.\\"MRP_FLG\\" = 1"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') as \\"SUM_STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK, " +" M_WH " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and M_WH.\\"MRP_FLG\\" = 1"
"select " +" VALUE " +"from " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"where " +" name = 'PAST_RESULT_ENTRY_TYP'"

cell.name: tmp_RCV_ISSUE_QTY
cell.description: 出庫数をマイナス値(出庫)、プラス値（入庫）に変換するためのワーク

cell.name: ODR_ISSUE_POSS_QTY
cell.description: 個別手配分出庫可能数
